snippet.title: Oddventure – Your Choice, Your Story. Early Access Begins 3.04!
snippet.description:
Oddventure – Your Choice, Your Story. Early Access Begins 3.04!
 Step into a dark and whimsical fairy tale where your choices shape the journey. 🌟

Oddventure is a turn-based RPG inspired by EarthBound and Undertale, blending dark humor, emotional storytelling, and deep choice-driven gameplay. Play as Charlie, a rebellious teenager searching for her lost brother in the twisted lands of the Kingdom of Luxia—where every decision matters, and every mistake has consequences.

⚔️ Key Features:
✔️ Choice-Driven Narrative – Your actions determine the fate of characters and the world.
✔️ Turn-Based Combat with a Twist – Fight, talk, or run—every encounter has multiple solutions.
✔️ Dark Humor & Emotional Depth – A unique mix of wit, satire, and heartfelt moments.
✔️ Hand-Drawn Pixel Art – A beautifully bizarre world brought to life with stunning visuals.
✔️ Multiple Endings – Your journey, your story, your consequences.

🕹️ Wishlist on Steam and prepare for the adventure of a lifetime!
📅 Early Access begins April 3rd!

🔗 Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1235710/Oddventure/
🔗 Kickstarter:https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/oddventure/oddventure-rpg-0
🔗 X (Twitter): https://x.com/erutnevddO
🔗 Discord: https://discord.com/invite/N7weu3B
#IndieGame #RPG #Oddventure #PixelArt #IndieDev #Undertale #EarthBound
